description: A secret criminal syndicate operating in the Grand Line, disguised as bounty hunters. Members are identified by code names and work in male-female pairs. The organization has a hierarchical structure with Officer Agents, Frontier Agents, Billions, and Millions.

keyMoments.title: Officer Agents Deployed
keyMoments.description: Baroque Works sends Officer Agents Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine to eliminate spies within the organization.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Officer Agents with Devil Fruit powers, showing the organization's true strength.

keyMoments.title: Infiltration Exposed
keyMoments.description: Vivi and Igaram's infiltration of Baroque Works is exposed, revealing they discovered the boss's identity.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the organization will eliminate anyone who discovers its leader's true identity.

keyMoments.title: Boss's Secret Referenced
keyMoments.description: The existence of a dangerous secret about Baroque Works' boss is confirmed.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the central mystery driving the Arabasta Arc.

hierarchy: Officer Agents (Numbered pairs with Devil Fruit powers)
structure.identificationSystem: Male members use numbers (Mr. 0-13), female members use days/holidays (Miss All Sunday, Miss Valentine, etc.)

goals.goal: Capture pirates entering the Grand Line
goals.description: Pose as welcoming townsfolk to lure and capture pirates for bounties.
The organization has secret plans involving the Arabasta Kingdom that must be protected at all costs.

statusHistory.description: Organization is actively operating in the Grand Line

secrets.description: The identity of Baroque Works' boss (Mr. 0) is so dangerous that anyone who learns it must be eliminated.

description: A kingdom located in the Grand Line with desert climate. Ruled by the Nefertari royal family. The kingdom is currently under threat from Baroque Works' mysterious conspiracy.

knownMembers.role: Captain of Super Spot-Billed Duck Troops

keyMoments.title: Royal Members Revealed
keyMoments.description: Princess Vivi and Captain Igaram are revealed to have infiltrated Baroque Works.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Arabasta Kingdom as a major player in the upcoming arc.

keyMoments.title: Kingdom Under Threat
keyMoments.description: Revealed that Baroque Works has a conspiracy against Arabasta Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the central conflict of the Arabasta Arc.

goals.description: Princess Vivi and Igaram infiltrated Baroque Works to discover who is plotting against the kingdom.

statusHistory.description: Kingdom is under threat from Baroque Works
